  4. AI poisoning tool Nightshade received 250000 downloads in 5 days: 'beyond anything we imagined'  VentureBeat
  5. New Tool That Protects Images From AI Nets 250000 Downloads In Just 5 Days  ExtremeTech

item.title: The FCC wants to criminalize AI robocall spam - The Register
item.description:
1. The FCC wants to criminalize AI robocall spam  The Register
